root.title: Wdigest CredGuard Registry Modification
root.description: Detects potential malicious modification of the property value of IsCredGuardEnabled from HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\SecurityProviders\WDigest to disable Cred Guard on a system. This is usually used with UseLogonCredential to manipulate the caching credentials.
root.author: Roberto Rodriguez (Cyb3rWard0g), OTR (Open Threat Research)
